paragraph.paragraph: The Assembly Info property page in the Common Properties folder contains the following properties:

Title
The assembly title custom attribute to be placed in project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest.

Description
The assembly description custom attribute to be placed in project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest.

Company
The company name custom attribute to be placed in project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest.

Product
The product name custom attribute to be placed in project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest.

Trademark
The trademark custom attribute to be placed in project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest.

Copyright
The copyright custom attribute to be placed in project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest.

Culture
Specifies which culture the assembly supports. For more information on cultures and localization, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconlocalization.htmLocalization.

Version
The four part version number held in the project ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblymanifest.htmAssembly Manifest. For more information on version numbers, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/cpguide/html/cpconassemblyversioning.htmAssembly Versioning.
